description: I cut and beveled the tile at the same time. The IQ 7-inch saw does a great job and speeds up miters. I use the Calidad 200 grit hand polishing pad for any minor chips. Out Gold and Platinum members have access to step-by-step tiling videos at homerepairtutor.com
title: Mitered Shower Niche Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
